CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, January 13, 1945, pg. 13, reads: "Steeds On Parade - No.1: The Indoor Horse Show for the benefit of Hill City, at Hunt Armory next Thursday, Friday and Saturday, will be one of the greatest and most unique sports events ever staged here...No. 3: A view of spacious Hunt Armory. One hundred and fifty truckloads of dirt were used to cover the cement floor.  Seating arrangements for 5,000 will be made.-Courier Photos by Harris."
TitMainTitle: Group of men standing in Hunt Armory preparing for horse show benefit for Hill City
